channel.title: Error message: Error running query: failed communicating with server. Please check your Internet connection and try again
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
A summary of the issue and the browser/OS environment in which it occurs.
Upgraded redash to **10.0.0.b50363** and postgres to **14** , Didn't faced any issue while upgrading, but on of sudden got an issue saying **Error message: Error running query: failed communicating with server. Please check your Internet connection and try again.**,
Tried to downgrade postgres to 13 , but the container keeps on restating even after adding restart : unless-stopped in my compose file.
Does redash 10 , support postgres versions higher then 9 ?
instance type: r5a.xlarge
And what can be the resolution. ?
* Redash Version: 10.0.0.b50363 * Browser/OS: brave / centos * How did you install Redash: Docker
